requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD with SSE2
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM (1 GB for Windows Vista)
  • Graphics: Videocard with Pixel Shader 2.0 support
  • DirectX®: Direct X 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB space free
  • Sound: Direct X compatible soundcard
